author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 10 persons belonging to two groups that clashed near Budalur in Thanjavur district have been arrested. Two persons belonging to a particular community suffered injuries in a group clash near the Four Road Junction at Budalur a couple of days back following which two separate complaints were filed with the Budalur police.

Acting on them, the police picked up two persons from Kodumburar Nagar and eight others from Kaliamman Koil Street in the village and all were produced before the Judicial Magistrate Tiruvaiyaru who remanded them in judicial custody for 15 days. Police are on the look out for some more persons connected to the incident.
title: Group clash: 10 held
